channel.title: Bbs on Joel Dare
channel.description: Recent content in Bbs on Joel Dare

item.title: Wireless BBS
item.description: Introduction I’m inspired by the nostalgia of the BBS systems of my youth and by the high cost of modern Internet service providers. By the impending loss of net neutrality in the United States and by the widespread spying of worldwide governments on their citizens and corporations on their customers. Wireless BBS is a configuration suggestion for local operators who wish to share websites with their communities without connection costs.
